title: #BMCSession.v1_0_0

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

RefreshActivationState.description: Activate or deactivate the current session.
RefreshActivationState.longDescription: Activate or deactivate the current session.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

UserAccount.description: The UserName for the account for this session.
UserAccount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the UserName that matches a registered account identified by a ManagerAccount resource registered with the Account Service.

LoginTime.description: It is the time when the session was created.
LoginTime.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the time at which the session was created.

UserIP.description: This is the IPAddress for the account.
UserIP.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an IPv4 address assigned to this interface.

LastLoginTime.description: Time when the previous session was created.
LastLoginTime.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the time at which the previous session was created.

LastLoginIP.description: IP address used for the last login.
LastLoginIP.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the IP address used to log in to the interface last time.

UserTag.description: The interface type for this session.
UserTag.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a string indicating which interface this session used.

MySession.description: This indicates whether this Session is itself.
MySession.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this Session is itself.

UserId.description: ID of the user who creates the session.
UserId.longDescription: ID of the user who creates the session.

UserValidDays.description: Validity period of the user who creates the session.
UserValidDays.longDescription: Validity period of the user who creates the session.

AccountInsecurePromptEnabled.description: Specifies whether to provide an alert if the user account is not secure.
AccountInsecurePromptEnabled.longDescription: Specifies whether to provide an alert if the user account is not secure.

UserRole.description: Role of the user who creates the session.
UserRole.longDescription: Role of the user who creates the session.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this session.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this session.
